website_summaries.verdict: Perfect kit for those who need starter equipment for improving video recording results, all at a good price.
pros: Kit has 2 light stands, 2 soft box reflectors, and 2 light bulbs, providing the basics you need at a relatively low price
Light stands adjust between 33 and 86 inches in height for plenty of versatility
Light sockets include long power cords, which is handy
cons: Included bulbs aren't bright enough for all video recording needs
Some build quality issues with the soft boxes

customer_reviews.title: okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: not sure how the seller thinks this is a 900W kit since bulbs are 105w and have not much throw, consistent with the nature of CFB bulbs. stands are low grade but adequate for indoor work, but sandbags are advised. design of soft box is actually intriguing since no ring is required to attach to bulb bracket. definitely a two-hand job to assemble. we used this kit for a single job and now will give it away to a student needing constant light and having no funds.
customer_reviews.author: jimatlanta

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased over 5 different soft boxes from Amazon, all of them GREAT! This time I cheaped out and went with soft boxes that were $20 cheaper. Mistake. The c-stands are cheap, the internal part of the soft boxes are cheap, it took forever to force the soft box open because it's not fluid, it came with smaller bulbs than other soft boxes and again, it's cheap. Pay the extra money and get the more expensive soft boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Can’t believe the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic package for the money! I am an actor and I home self-tape a lot for auditions. This package comes in a nice package that can store under your bed or in your closet. It’s perfect and easy. Be prepared because it takes about 15 minutes to set up. And take down. But it’s easy. Just a lot of parts to assemble. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Shalansky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for YouTube Videos
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a YouTube channel for makeup and these are perfect for balancing the light outside of a ring light. She absolutely loves them and they were fairly simple to set up. The only thing I had trouble with at first was putting the light bulbs in but you have to set them in a certain way first until they start to attach. Also, adjust the legs on light stands so the lights don't tip over if you don't have weight bags. Amazing price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ayala

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This light set up is amazing. It is high quality and easy to use. I believe that at twice the cost it would still be a bargain. The bulbs alone are worth half the cost. Each light stand went to the top of my living room ceilings. It comes with a great carrying case which makes storage and travel easy. This makes any room like daylight at any time of the day. The diffusion is great when needed as it comes with a cloth light cover.
customer_reviews.author: RAMM

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these thinking I was getting an upgrade, but they aren't very bright at all. I'm not sure why they've gotten such great reviews. I purchased some $5 lamps from Walmart and threw in daylight bulbs. Those are much brighter, better, and cheaper. I'm probably going to return these. I'm testing them out a little more first. Also, came with no instructions on how to assemble etc. Just a bunch of stuff in the bag. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Loved these Lights
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with these. Quick shipping, easy to assemble and the lighting quality is BOMB. My only issue (as is with the top heavy products) is connection from the light box at the top to the base is quite flimsy. Anchoring it down is problematic and I could see this an an issue if you have to move these around a lot. I have these in my studio permanently so they dont move, but that connection wears quickly (and would need a replacement) if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: TipsFromTori

customer_reviews.title: One star missing for the 3 week wait supposed to be prime
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 instead of five stars because this cane extremely late almost 4 weeks.... however what I like is the product! I do YouTube videos and I like to record at night this makes it look like daylight like I’m surrounded literally surrounded by windows in the morning! So for that and the easy assembly I have to give the product itself 4 stars but still pretty ticked about the 4 days shy of the month wait
customer_reviews.author: Lena Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I use these to take photos of pieces of refurbished furniture in my basement. It's an easy setup and they work amazing! The quality of my photos has definitely improved. The customer service is fantastic! I was having trouble with one of the light bulbs after a few months of purchasing. I didn't think anything could be done, but I reached out because you never know until you ask! To my surprise, they responded within 24 hours and sent me a brand new lightbulb free of charge! I was shocked and super happy with the customer service I received! I would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs is filming or taking photos and needs extra lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Grillz9909

customer_reviews.title: bright lights
customer_reviews.text: liked how bright the lights were... disliked how top heavy they are on the stand, had to add some sand bags to legs to keep them from tipping over, had to buy sand bags separate as they didn't come with any.
customer_reviews.author: debbie perry

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: A classic case of you get what you pay for. I'm not saying that's bad necessarily but you are not getting great quality at a cheap price you are getting cheap quality at a cheap price. The quality is good enough to get you started when you are on a budget and they do work. This is not a rip off in any way it's just entry-level quality at an entry-level price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Great product photo lights or home studio
customer_reviews.text: Strong studio lights! Sturdy stands! Great quality product especially for the price: surprised how strong the watts are... perfect for shooting clothing/products or portraits indoors. Easy to setup and I’ve encountered no issues using them over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this lighting kit. My photos turn out great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as order and what was expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar lighting setup and required additional lighting for my green screen scene that I was doing for Halloween guests. This product was nicely packed and easily setup in a few minutes. The light output was exactly as described and put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect softbox kit, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I use this kit for my YouTube channel and it works great. It comes with a carrying case, all of the lightbulbs and adjustable stands. The lighting is bright and you can adjust the height of the softboxes. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Mason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!  Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about amazing! The lamps rock! I’m lighting a 500sqft space and it is night and day! I was skeptical given the price but the bulbs, bags, tripods and assembly were all just great! Construction is sturdy. We’ve done some test video shots and they all look great!
customer_reviews.author: Twitch37

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lighting duo. I am impressed with the quality and performance. I am not a pro by any means, but it worked wonderfully for my at home portrait taking of my family.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, strong lights and easy to build it. The price was also amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! They are fantastic for my product photography!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Eyre

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! Super easy to assemble and give great lighting. Just be a little careful. I ended bumping into one of them and it fell. So the light bulb broke. it's pretty light weight and can tip over if you are not careful. Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidy

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: I did a full product review on youtube but in short. Amazing lighting! More than I expected! Best Value! I am very happy with this purchase and I highly recommend anyone purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Apikian

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy at all! Wife loves it, i bought it because she life photography
customer_reviews.author: joel coronel ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily for web calls and they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Deryk Faber

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only used on four shoots for twenty-minutes each. had them for three months as back-up worked well, but time will tell how long the bulbs last.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the money. Easy to assemble. I use them for my virtual classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rakhsha Nasseripour

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting set
customer_reviews.text: Does not take up too much space, even when not in use. Lighting makes me glow 😃💡
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: This lighting rocks
customer_reviews.text: We love this it's for our parakeets we love taking their pictures
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of light!
customer_reviews.text: This lighting system is really great overall but has a slight bulky aspect to it. So if your “studio” space is limited like mine, it helps to see where the lighting position works best so you can keep using the same arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Van Dyk

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing lights. The only thing that is a downfall is breaking it down and putting it back up, although the lighting is definitely worth it. The bulbs are big and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Caresse Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and ready to use
customer_reviews.text: I just tried the product and it works very well, it's super easy to assemble and adjust and the light is great. Very satisfied indeed!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Álvarez

customer_reviews.title: The lights
customer_reviews.text: Products are great ! Light are very bright and looks professional thanks
customer_reviews.author: tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product I used it for some YouTube videos and just taking pictures as well great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Timber

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights I use them for my videos on YouTube light quality is amazing and easy to carry around comes in case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great light set up. Gives plenty of light and although they don’t dim you can put something over to shade the light or move them away from the subject. They can seem a little top heavy so the stand being wider at the base would be nice. Can’t complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not aprreciate receiving a used product that was suposed to be New
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Emart Softbox Lighting Kit and was very disappointed to notice that it was a used one. It does work; but if you're going to send something used, I think will be fair to say it in the product description
customer_reviews.author: Palca

product_meta.title: Emart 1000W Softbox Lighting Kit Photography Continuous Photo Studio Light System for YouTube Video Shooting Soft Box 24" x 24"
feature_bullets: This 24" x 24 " softbox lighting kit ultimate soften light stream and remove shadow to make perfect shooting. Ideal for youtube videos, portrait, video studio, still-photography

Continuous Output Lighting: 2 x 105W CFL light bulbs, 5500K pure white daylight, provide the bright and accurate colors, to capture the most real picture. Come with the white cloth cover to soften the light and not harsh
Flexible Use: The lamp holder allows 210° angle adjustments in every which way you so desire. Equipped with 9.8 FT power cord, more convenient in working
Highly Portable: Super simple, effective softbox lighting setup, Push-and-click design. Adjust light stand Min Height 33" to Max Height 86", supporting the softbox steady work
Double Protection: Upgraded material and independent control switch make the product safer during use. 12 MOUTHS WARRANTY, 24 HOURS SERVICES, do our best to make you satisfied

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
